channel.title: Windows Workstation check leaks
channel.description:
Hi! I use Windows Workstation how check it on leaks? [url=https://www.whonix.org/w/images/d/dd/Whonix_concept_refined.jpg]https://www.whonix.org/w/images/d/dd/Whonix_concept_refined.jpg[/url]
What does it mean in Whonix Gateway? [code][102.048738] hrtimer: interrupt took 1674870 ms[/code]
Which You recommend host systems for Virtualbox & Whonix?

item.title: Windows Workstation check leaks
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
VBox host recommendation:

Whonix

Computer Security Education

Basic Computer Security Advice. Useful Before Installing Whonix for Better Security.

Windows leak testing:
I donâ€™t think instructions for this exist. You can get inspiration from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Leak_Tests and then try to figure out how to run these instructions to Windows.

That message means:
Likely nothing important. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian applies.
